summary: This is just a Translation from the original \"The Batcave\" mod from the_rotton_core.
descriptionHtml: All begins when my cousin see me playing with th batsuit. Then he asked me for it, and complain when it was in english (we\'re both from Brazil) so I\'ve decided to translate it for him. The owner give me permission to share it so, here we are. Feel free to download it and coment any portuguese errors, I\"m just a human, so antecipated sorry for any errors.
author: The_Rotton_Core
